thread.title: Irene Medak
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Irene Medak

author: Irene Medak
title: Irene Medak
text: My local bathroom supplier suggested The Shower Doctor for the spare part I needed, as the original company who supplied the shower is no longer in business. Having found the item on their website with excellent details and even a demonstration of fitting it I have ordered it, and the goods were in my possession in less than 24 hours. I even had been given an exact delivery time slot within one hour. A very pleasant experience. Thank you Shower Doctor
